post:
Hello Let people , 

last week i have ask here if someone want to colocate cheap miners in our new location with a cheap electrical power cost and not much interest find for the moment so we have decided to offer something what many person were asking me so here i am :

PLEASE NOTE THIS : IS A PRE-ORDER AND WE CAN DELAY UP TO 10 LABOR DAYS TO PROVIDE IT,  SO PLEASE IN THIS TIME DO NOT OPEN TICKETS ASK WHEN YOUR VPS WILL BE PROVIDED BECAUSE YOU WILL GIVE US MORE WORK AND DEFINITELY WILL NOT BE MORE FAST. 

Will be new templates like debian 8 , ubuntu 18 , ETC ...

THIS IS FOR AFFILIATES : if i see one page who promote this product without mention the delivery time this affiliate will be deleted from our program. We want to sell not to cheat our customers.


All this clarified (i hope ) we offer 500 cupons (for each plan)  in any storage plan posted in our website : https://hostsolutions.ro/eng/hosting/cheap-storage-vps


The cupon code is " newlocation" and can be used for 6 month payment minimum ( sorry but we need to avoid fees ) 


so i will give some exemple here :

for the plan 1tb for 6 month you will pay only 14.70 eur  (recurring for life !)

etc etc.

Any question i am here to respond.

Also want to thanks all let people because always was a % of our business.


This promo will run up to day 15.09.2018 or until all vps is gone.

The principal network will be liberty global
